review: I will highly recommend you to visit Dr. Prashanth marka’s clinic. I am very happy with the care and patience shown by the doctor. He is kind, gentle, patient and brilliant at his job. He takes his work very seriously and does it with passion. I am very satisfied with my treatment and would recommend you to visit the clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I want to express my sincere gratitude for the outstanding care and service I received during my year-long dental implant process at your clinic. From the initial consultation to the final implant placement, the experience was exceptional.

Dr. Prashanth garu's expertise and professionalism were evident from the start. Each step was thoroughly explained, alleviating any concerns I had. His skill and attention to detail ensured the best possible outcome.

The staff were always welcoming and attentive, making each visit feel like visiting family. Their friendliness and willingness to assist with any questions made every visit pleasant. The clinic was consistently clean and comfortable, with exemplary attention to hygiene and patient safety. Communication was clear and consistent, with well-coordinated appointments and timely updates. I always felt well-informed and confident in the care I received.

My overall experience with Dr. Prashanth garu and the team has been excellent, highly recommend their services to anyone in need of dental care.
reply_text:
Thank you Sreedhar for such an awesome feedback. 
Thank you for sharing your experience. Team PRASHANTH DENTAL is fully committed to deliver the same quality dental care every time you visit us. Thanks again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Fillings,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,
review:
I know Dr. Prashanth for the past 6-7 years and he is a very friendly doctor who explains about the problem and the treatment very clearly. 

I visited the clinic in this week for dental filling and he is taking all the required precautions (providing sanitiser, hand gloves , leg gloves , masks etc) for the patients by keeping the current Covid situations in mind. 
Appreciate it!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited the doctor for tooth pain. He took enough time to listen my problem and asked about past regarding the problem. Did some primary investigation and find out the cause for the problem. Explianed clearly what happened and why. Provided couple of solutions and their pros and cons. Asked me to decide on the solution based on the pros. Am very much impressed by the way doctor took care about the problem. The clinic is also well equipped and the staff is also very good.
